ENVy is the easy way to build
development environments

Jump into new projects and get up to speed faster than ever

  • Let's get started!

For Developers

Working on projects that use ENVy to manage dependecies couldn't be easier. Just type envy up and you're ready to start contributing. ENVy takes care of the hard part of configuring your system with everything you need to start writing code. Following long setup guides and worrying about dependency conflicts is a thing of the past. Plus, the project remains completely isolated from your computer.

For Maintainers

Lower the barriers to contributing to your projects. With just one command, developers can be ready to start writing code and helping solve problems. Plus, ENVy allows you to specify exactly the environment you want all of your contributors to use - including Linux distribution and native dependencies. No need to worry about a contributing or setup guide - if you're using ENVy then all of your contributors will be using the exact same system.

  • Get Started

An open-source project trying to make contributing less painful
